trans-unit.source: Provides information for the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity.BeforeSend" /> and <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity.AfterResponse" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity.BeforeSend" /> 與 <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity.AfterResponse" /> 事件的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity that threw the event associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity，它會擲回與這個 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs" /> 有關聯的事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity" /> that threw the event associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity" />，擲回與這個 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs" /> 有關聯的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity" /> that threw the event associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivity" />，已擲回與此 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SendActivityEventArgs" /> 關聯的事件。
